ygData.messageBody:
Hail! I am Odhinn MacDoughl, 21st level Barbarian Warrior on the worst =
server to be a Warrior on, Rallos Zek. I've been seeing ye all chat =
about the polished granite tomahawks, and I'm here to answer.

1.) Acquisition: Gexnor (sp) Mucktail in Highpass, who respawns from =
half an hour to once a day, carries the tomahawk, but only rarely. =
Other times he carries the Cracked Darkwood Shield or other useless =
items. Mucktail is always camped. I waited a week to get my first =
tommy, and decided to just pay for my second. I paid 200pp, a =
reasonable price considering I could level and do other things while =
some bum waited around for Mucky to come back.

2.) Utilization: As ye may have inferred above, I have two Tommys. =
And god I love them. The damage isn't great per hit, but you get alot =
of hits (6 damage, 26 delay). It is, of course, a magic item. But the =
best best best feature is that it casts Berserker Strength, which has =
saved my arse more times than I care to admit. In long melees, it may =
cast several times, in most melees it will cast just once. But what it =
does is amazing for warriors. +20 STR, -10 AGI, and a little thing =
called a Magic Shield. That's right, a 50-150point Invulnerability to =
attacks, just like them damn magic users get. You get this a couple of =
times in a battle, and you, my friend, are on top of the world, cuz all =
the enemy damage gets soaked.

So, Tommy's are A.) Expensive B.) Kickass. I love 'em ;)

Odhinn MacDoughl
Skald, Hand Of Tyr
21st Level Barbarian Warrior
